backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and appointment requests with access control for viewing, saving, and admin-only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregated feature evidence listing design updates, affected files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing styling, layout, pages, and thematic updates across frontend components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app entrypoint and metadata.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and referencing sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all site routes with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React Router setup defining all primary routes and linking them to page components.
frontend/src/components/BrandSections.ts: Reusable ScriptureBlock and EventHighlight components rendering stylized religious content sections.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Shows a grid of service offerings with images, descriptions, optional notes, and CTA links.
frontend/src/components/home/UpcomingEve: Displays upcoming events with images, details, and styled event information blocks.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipAvaila: Static availability calendar component with legend and styled grid for leadership scheduling.
frontend/src/components/MinistrySealsSec: Renders a grid of ministry seal images with dialog popups for enlarged viewing and captions.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Provides a layout wrapper component that applies background, spacing, and container styles to page sections.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryCtas.tsx: Displays primary call‑to‑action links with different layouts for hero, header, and mobile variants.
frontend/src/components/SeoManager.tsx: Updates document SEO metadata based on the current route, including title, meta tags, and canonical link.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Builds the site footer with branding, quick links, contact link, decorative elements, and copyright line.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with navigation, footer, SEO manager, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Implements the responsive site navigation bar with logo, links, CTAs, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Typography.tsx: Provides reusable typography components for titles, subtitles, and body text with consistent styling.
frontend/src/content/ministrySeals.ts: Exports a list of ministry seal and event images with metadata for use in image galleries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting and fetching appointment requests and managing the caller’s user profile via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, theme variables, and custom component classes for the app’s visual design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Renders the Connect page with service times, location info, live-stream section, and social media placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/GatheringAt6Page.tsx: Displays details for The Gathering at 6 event including schedule, location, and what attendees can expect.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero banner, welcome text, events, services, and core values sections.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipGovernanceP: Displays leadership roles, bio of the presiding prelate, availability calendar, and governance structure.
frontend/src/pages/MinistriesPage.tsx: Outlines major ministry areas, shows ministry seals, and invites users to get involved.
frontend/src/pages/OurMissionPage.tsx: Explains the church’s mission and commitment with highlight sections for Connect, Empower, and Extend.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachPage.tsx: Describes community outreach efforts with sections on care, resource assistance, and events.
frontend/src/pages/ScheduleMeetingPage.t: Form page allowing authenticated users to request appointments with leaders using detailed form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/VisitPage.tsx: React page describing what visitors can expect at the church with sections, icon cards, and links to connect pages.
frontend/src/pages/WhoWeArePage.tsx: React page outlining the church’s identity, beliefs, and purpose using structured sections and feature blocks.
frontend/src/seo/routeMeta.ts: Defines SEO metadata for routes and provides a helper to retrieve metadata by pathname.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Utility that builds encoded public URLs for static assets under the /assets path.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, and utilities for the site’s design system.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, design goals, required images, and tracked feature updates.
